original_text: You shall teach them diligently to your children, and shall talk of them when you sit in your house, and when you walk by the way, and when you lie down, and when you rise.
korean_text: 네 자녀에게 부지런히 가르치며 집에 앉았을 때에든지 길을 갈 때에든지 누워 있을 때에든지 일어날 때에든지 이 말씀을 강론할 것이며

sentences.original_text: You shall teach them diligently to your children
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 네 자녀에게 그것을 부지런히 가르치고

sentences.original_text: and shall talk of them when you sit in your house
sentences.korean_translation: 네 집에 앉아 있을 때에 그것을 말하며

sentences.original_text: and when you walk by the way
